verbose_text: The Ang-1 gene also inhibits endothelial cell apoptosis, promotes vessel matuarion, maintains the stability of blood vessels and antagonizes the vascular permeability caused by endothelial growth factors, ultimately attenuating ventricular remodeling and cardiac dysfunction due to the lack of myocardial cells.
evidence: Ang-1 gene also inhibits endothelial cell apoptosis
